players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm worried about who the mafia is. Bob, why were you silent?"
Charlie: "Based on my investigation last night, Alice is the mafioso. We should vote her out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, you're wrong! I'm not the mafia—maybe you're trying to mislead us. Bob's silence is suspicious too."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. Her deflection is classic mafia tactics. Bob, let's vote her out to end this threat."

players.name: Bob
memory: Alice: "I'm worried about who the mafia is. Bob, why were you silent?"
Charlie: "Based on my investigation last night, Alice is the mafioso. We should vote her out to protect the town."
Alice: "Charlie, you're wrong! I'm not the mafia—maybe you're trying to mislead us. Bob's silence is suspicious too."
Charlie: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. Her deflection is classic mafia tactics. Bob, let's vote her out to end this threat."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Alice
